UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user profile in the FoodFPet application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user profile.

lowFoodAlerts.description: Enable or disable low food alerts.

feederId.description: The ID of the single feeder linked to this user's account.

ownerId.description: The UID of the user who owns this feeder.

bowlLevel.description: Percentage of food remaining in the bowl.

storageLevel.description: Percentage of food remaining in the main storage container.

currentWeight.description: The current weight of food in the storage container, in grams.

FeedingSchedule.title: FeedingSchedule
FeedingSchedule.description: Represents a scheduled feeding event for a specific feeder.

id.description: Unique identifier for the feeding schedule.

feederId.description: ID of the feeder this schedule belongs to.

scheduledTime.description: The date and time the feeder is scheduled to dispense food.

sent.description: Indicates if the feeding command has been sent to the feeder.

FeedingLog.title: FeedingLog
FeedingLog.description: Represents a log entry for a feeding event.

id.description: Unique identifier for the feeding log entry.

feederId.description: ID of the feeder this log belongs to.

timestamp.description: The time the feeding event occurred.

portionSize.description: The amount of food dispensed in grams.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user. Corresponds to the Firebase Auth UID.

definition.description: Stores all data and state for a specific feeder device.

params.name: feederId
params.description: The unique identifier for the feeder device.

definition.description: Stores feeding schedules for a specific feeder.

params.name: feederId
params.description: The unique identifier for the feeder.

params.name: scheduleId
params.description: The unique identifier for the feeding schedule.

definition.description: Stores feeding logs for a specific feeder.

params.name: feederId
params.description: The unique identifier for the feeder.

params.name: logId
params.description: The unique identifier for the feeding log entry.

firestore.reasoning: The data model is now normalized. User data is in `/users/{userId}`. Device data is in a separate top-level collection `/feeders/{feederId}`. The user's profile contains a `feederId` to link them to their device. This is a more scalable and maintainable structure.
